TextView.android:text:
Main motive of this app is to help the user with location updates.

All you have to do is to accept location permissions.
Then you can search for any location or just click on the map to add desired location for the alert.
As soon as you click or search, you can then set the radius around your selected location for the reminder according to you.
We will remind you when your device will enter the boundary of the circle you set.
Setting circle od large radius if you are moving fast is recommended.
You can turn off the alert if you don't want you to be notified.
